results.deck: Blitz: The League is an arcade style football game and is a part of the long running Blitz series by Midway.
results.name: Blitz: The League

results.deck: The first installment of DDR games exclusive to the Xbox console.
results.name: Dance Dance Revolution ULTRAMIX

results.deck: A tennis game from Infogrames that was never released in the US.
results.name: Slam Tennis

results.deck: Madden NFL 2005 was one of the better years of the Madden series with improved features, physics, presentation and graphics.
results.name: Madden NFL 2005

results.deck: Another installment of the AA franchise.
results.name: America's Army: Rise of a Soldier

results.deck: Total Overdose is an arguably racist action game that mixes gameplay elements of GTA and Max Payne in a Mexican-style cocktail.
results.name: Total Overdose

results.deck: Area 51 for the Xbox, Playstation 2, and PC takes place in top secret base, Area 51 where you and your team were on a recon mission. All goes wrong and you end up on your own; left to venture further to escape, and uncover the truth behind it all.
results.name: Area-51

results.deck: Spy Hunter: Nowhere to Run is the third game in the vehicle-combat franchise. Nowhere to Run is the first game to add on-foot missions to the series.
results.name: Spy Hunter: Nowhere to Run

results.deck: Football with no rules.
results.name: NFL Blitz 20-03

results.deck: A sequel to the events of Castlevania III:  Dracula's Curse.  Hector, a devil forgemaster that fled Dracula's service, seeks revenge and must stop Isaac, another forgemaster still loyal to Dracula.
results.name: Castlevania: Curse of Darkness

results.deck: The sequel to the original Tournament Paintball game
results.name: Greg Hastings' Tournament Paintball MAX'D

results.deck: Panzer Dragoon Orta is a rail shooter for the original Xbox in which the player rides a dragon.  The game is the fourth in the Panzer Dragoon series which began on the Sega Saturn.
results.name: Panzer Dragoon Orta

results.deck: A Europe only soccer game.
results.name: International Superstar Soccer 2

results.deck: Pocket Bike Racer is a racing game released by Burger King much in the vein of cartoon racing games such as Mario Kart.
results.name: Pocketbike Racer

results.deck: A video game based on the Quentin Tarantino movie of the same name.
results.name: Reservoir Dogs

results.deck: LMA Manager 2003 is the 2002/2003 football season iteration of the football management series.
results.name: LMA Manager 2003

results.deck: John Mullins returns once again to save the world from a terrorist organization bent on destroying it through chemical warfare.
results.name: Soldier of Fortune II: Double Helix

results.deck: This is Microsoft's first foray into console football gaming.
results.name: NFL Fever 2002

results.deck: A game based on the Indy Racing Series by Codemasters.
results.name: IndyCar Series

results.deck: Frontline follows the European Theater, starting with the Normandy Beach landings.
results.name: Medal of Honor: Frontline

results.deck: Go behind the visor as players take the role of RoboCop, clearing the streets of Neo Detroit from crime.
results.name: RoboCop

results.deck: As a member of Task Force: 121 you must eliminate the Marxist Rebels before they can recruit allies, and endanger United States interests.
results.name: Combat: Task Force 121

results.deck: A racing game, not unlike a kart racer but featuring foot races.
results.name: Mad Dash Racing

results.deck: MVP Baseball 2003 is the inaugural entry in EA's MVP Baseball franchise.
results.name: MVP Baseball 2003

results.deck: NFL Head Coach is the first game in EA's very in-depth football simulation series.
results.name: NFL Head Coach

results.deck: Serious Sam II ramps up the over-the-top shooting and humor the series is known for with more ridiculous weapons and enemies.
results.name: Serious Sam II

results.deck: Samurai sword-based fighting game released early in the Xbox's life.
results.name: Kabuki Warriors

results.deck: All-Star Baseball 2003 is a release from Acclaim on various platforms. It features Derek Jeter as the cover athlete playing for the New York Yankees.
results.name: All-Star Baseball 2003

results.deck: Players race snowmobiles around over-the-top courses throughout the world.  And shoot each other with rockets.
results.name: Arctic Thunder

results.deck: A game in which you control your very own army of goblins. Players can choose between different types of units and heroes to wage war against rival hordes.
results.name: Goblin Commander: Unleash the Horde

results.deck: A game based on the Indiana Jones franchise.
results.name: Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb
The Dukes of Hazzard: Return of the General Lee

results.deck: An action-adventure rollerblading game based on the eponymous popular character and her many Sanrio friends.
results.name: Hello Kitty: Roller Rescue

results.deck: Archon-like, Wrath Unleashed features strategic hex-based maneuvering followed by 3D combat in order to control territory and defeat the opposing side.  The objective is to crush the enemy completely or vanquish their god.
results.name: Wrath Unleashed

results.deck: NHL 07 was the 16th game of the NHL franchise from EA Sports.
results.name: NHL 07

results.deck: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time is an action-adventure game with a heavy focus on platforming. The story revolves around the wry Prince, a time-altering dagger, and a kingdom beset by a plague-like evil.
results.name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time

results.deck: MVP Baseball 2004 is the second game in the MVP franchise. The game built upon the successes of the original while including new features such as the addition of Minor League affiliates.
results.name: MVP Baseball 2004

results.deck: Arma: Cold War Assault is a combat simulator released in 2001 by Codemasters. The game has been praised for its accurate portrayal of combat scenarios, and has been used in virtual training by the United States Marine Corps.
results.name: Operation Flashpoint: Cold War Crisis

results.deck: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects is a third person fighting game from Marvel and EA. The game features original characters from the Marvel Universe as well as new characters made by EA.
results.name: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects

results.deck: Follow John Constantine as he fights to save humanity, save the earth and save his own soul.
results.name: Constantine

results.deck: A horse racing simulation game.
results.name: Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships

results.deck: Fight Night 2004 is a boxing game. It includes a career, exibition, and create a fighter modes. It also includes former and current fight in all weight divisions.
results.name: Fight Night 2004

results.deck: The third game in the Outlaw sports franchise, Outlaw Volleyball is the first volleyball game in the series.
results.name: Outlaw Volleyball

results.deck: A modern turn-based tactical shooter.
results.name: Future Tactics: The Uprising

results.deck: Dead or Alive 3 is the third installment of Team Ninja's 3D Fighting game series Dead or Alive. Hitomi the karate master, Christie the assassin and drunken fighter, Brad Wong are added to the roster. The superior Japanese 3.1 release tweaked the gameplay mechanics and moves creating a masterpiece never released in the states.
results.name: Dead or Alive 3

results.deck: An adult-oriented BMX game published by Acclaim.
results.name: BMX XXX

results.deck: Take the role of the undead warrior Raikoh Minamoto and his companions as they are tasked with vanquishing the invading hordes of demons and protecting Japan's capital city from being consumed by the darkness.
results.name: Otogi 2: Immortal Warriors

results.deck: Play through the events of all three Matrix films as Neo, with an alternate ending written by the Wachowski sisters.
results.name: The Matrix: Path of Neo

results.deck: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 brings the skateboarding franchise to the sixth generation of game consoles, bringing new levels, new skaters, new tricks (such as hidden trick variations and the Revert), and online multiplayer.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3

results.deck: A Steampunk Third-Person Shooter developed by Smilebit for the Xbox.
results.name: GunValkyrie

results.deck:
Third game in the Broken Sword franchise. Once more, George and Nico must travel the world, wrestling danger and piecing together the clues that will unravel the secrets of the Sleeping Dragon.

Like previous Broken Sword games, Broken Sword: The Sleeping Dragon plays heavily on popular history and fantasy mythology.
results.name: Broken Sword: The Sleeping Dragon

results.deck: Hoodlum Havoc is a 3-D platformer from Ubisoft starring limbless hero Rayman. A hilarious story takes a few twists as Rayman sets out to stop the evil black lum Andre and his army of hoodlums.
results.name: Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc

results.deck: Control a massive Vertical Tank in this mech-game from Capcom.
results.name: Steel Battalion

results.deck: Race your way through Atlanta, San Diego and Detroit, with a variety of customized vehicles in Rockstar's 3rd game in the Midnight Club series. Re-released as Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition Remix.
results.name: Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition

results.deck: A baseball game.
results.name: ESPN Major League Baseball

results.deck: Futurama is a game based on the award winning television show, and features many of the original cast members and creative writing.
results.name: Futurama

results.deck: A survival horror game set in the British Museum. You play as either Dr. Darien Dane or his assistant Victoria Sutton on a search to retrieve a cursed Egyptian artifact recently stolen from the museum.
results.name: Curse: The Eye of Isis

results.deck: A fighting game based on the Shrek movie franchise. It is similar in structure to the Smash Bros and Power Stone games.
results.name: Shrek SuperSlam

results.deck: First entry in the Splinter Cell series.  You are Sam Fisher, a highly-trained covert operative working for a division of the NSA known as Third Echelon. As Sam, you must infiltrate heavily guarded areas in order to combat the threat of terrorism.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell

results.deck: A licensed first-person shooter created by Rebellion featuring the popular 2000AD comic book character Judge Dredd.
results.name: Judge Dredd: Dredd vs. Death

results.deck: Busted out of death row, inmate James Earl Cash wakes up to find himself in a snuff film directed by a man who calls himself Starkweather.
results.name: Manhunt

results.deck: Mega Man Anniversary Collection contains the first 8 Mega Man entries in the franchise, along with many extra features and unlockable games.
results.name: Mega Man Anniversary Collection

results.deck: Pariah is a first person shooter where players take control of a doctor called Jack Mason.
results.name: Pariah

results.deck: Wallace & Gromit face off against Feathers McGraw, the villainous penguin, who has escaped from the penguin enclosure and taken over the Zoo.
results.name: Wallace & Gromit in Project Zoo

results.deck: A 3D version of the classic game.
results.name: Frogger Beyond

results.deck: NFL Street is EA's first foray into arcade style football games. Based around extreme hits and fast plays, NFL Street separates itself from other arcade games with its stylish visuals and Gamebreaker mechanics from the NBA Street games.
results.name: NFL Street

results.deck: The Dark Knight returns to stop a series of seemingly unrelated crimes in this 3D action platformer based on The New Batman Adventures animated TV series.
results.name: Batman: Vengeance

results.deck: Run Like Hell is an action adventure third-person shooter game for the PS2 and Xbox.
results.name: Run Like Hell

results.deck: This is Midway's second game in the Slugfest series.
results.name: MLB SlugFest 20-04

results.deck: Silent Hill 4 is the fourth installment of the Survival-Horror series of the same name. This edition stars Henry Townshend, who is possessed remotely by the town of Silent Hill and forced to face an undead serial killer and multiple hellish dimensions in order to escape from his own apartment.
results.name: Silent Hill 4: The Room

results.deck: Intellivision Lives is a collection of 68 classic Intellivision games.
results.name: Intellivision Lives!

results.deck: The third entry in the MLB SlugFest baseball game series.
results.name: MLB Slugfest Loaded

results.deck: Rallisport Challenge 2 expands on the original game, offering more cars, more tracks, and a more satisfying driving model as you drift, jump, and roll your car to victory.
results.name: RalliSport Challenge 2

results.deck: A compilation of the first two Super Monkey Ball games with additional stages and mini-games thrown in, released for the Xbox and PlayStation 2 instead of the GameCube. Contains over 300 stages of ball-rolling puzzle action.
results.name: Super Monkey Ball Deluxe

results.deck: 007: Everything or Nothing is a 3rd-person action game from Electronic Arts in the James Bond franchise. The game features Pierce Brosnan's likeness and voice as Bond, Willem Dafoe as the chief antagonist and other notable actors as new and recurring characters in an original movie-style adventure.
results.name: 007: Everything or Nothing

results.deck: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance is the fifth installment in the violent fighting game franchise and the first "revival" of the series, introducing multiple fighting styles for each character.
results.name: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance

results.deck: Psyvariar 2 is the sequel to one of the most intense top down shooter games ever made. In Psyvariar 2, there are two types of ships to control; one that levels up by shooting and another that levels up by absorbing bullets.
results.name: Psyvariar 2

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors 4 is a hack and slash video game and the fourth installment in the popular Dynasty Warriors series. Dynasty Warriors 4 was developed by Omega Force and published by Koei. The game is available on PlayStation 2 (PS2) and Xbox and is based on a series of books called Romance of the Three Kingdoms, written by Luo Guanzhong
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 4

results.deck: Hitman: Contracts is the third entry in the Hitman series. A wounded 47 seeks refuge in a shoddy apartment and reminisces his earlier missions in the darkness and the rain... Contracts takes place after mission 3 of Blood Money.
results.name: Hitman: Contracts

results.deck: Ninja Gaiden Black is a re-release of Team Ninja's 2004 Xbox game. Its enhanced visuals, tweaked gameplay, and new mission mode make it the "definitive version" in the eyes of game director Tomonobu Itagaki.
results.name: Ninja Gaiden Black

results.deck: A James Bond first-person shooter from Eurocom.
results.name: 007: Nightfire

results.deck: Madden '06 introduces  the Truck Stick and Superstar Mode to EA's popular Madden franchise.
results.name: Madden NFL 06

results.deck: An action-adventure remake of the 1983 arcade title Dragon's Lair.
results.name: Dragon's Lair 3D: Return to the Lair

results.deck: Brute Force was a highly anticipated Xbox-exclusive shooter that was developed by Digital Anvil.
results.name: Brute Force
